name: BetterGFMotes
body:
`Ignore: <link rel="chrome-webstore-item" href="https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/biejbmijmlhaaafdfbpngiflnpjhipco">`

#BetterGFMotes

##What is BetterGFMotes?

BetterGFMotes is a browser plug-in that allows you to view and use additional Gravity Falls-themed emotes on Reddit.

##Features

- Adds dozens of new emotes to Reddit, and more to come!
- See /r/gravityfalls emotes throughout Reddit
- Search, sort, and view additional emotes
- Adds emote modifiers, such as -r, -in, and -sepia.
- Works natively in many popular browsers
- Adds site-wide spoiler tags

##Download

![Firefox](http://files.softicons.com/download/application-icons/round-app-icons-by-ampeross/ico/Mozilla.ico) You can install BetterGFMotes for Firefox by clicking [**here**](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/bettergfmotes/biejbmijmlhaaafdfbpngiflnpjhipco)

![Google Chrome](http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/carlosjj/google-jfk/128/chrome-icon.png) You can install BetterGFMotes on the Google Chrome Web Store by clicking [**here**](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/bettergfmotes/biejbmijmlhaaafdfbpngiflnpjhipco/)

![Opera](http://i.imgur.com/1CWfwGF.png) You can install BetterGFMotes with Opera if you first install the [**Download Chrome Extension**](https://addons.opera.com/en/extensions/details/download-chrome-extension-9/) plug-in, then installing the Google Chrome version.

##Preview

Below, you can use BetterGFMotes' emote selector to view our emotes.
` Coming soon!`
